title: Hubert und Staller
synopsis: Despite their mismatched styles, police officer partners Hubert and Staller rely on teamwork as they investigate murder cases in rural Bavaria.

title: Hier kommt: Lola
synopsis: The daughter of a Brazilian father and German mother, Lola is a little girl who dreams shes a rock star, but mostly dreams of having a best friend.

title: Stadtlandliebe
synopsis: Stressed out in the city, a couple relocates from Berlin to rural Kloppendorf, only to discover that country life isnt exactly what they had hoped.

title: Die Nordsee von oben
synopsis: Using cutting-edge technology, filmmakers soar high above where Germany meets the North Sea, capturing the landscape there in magnificent detail.

title: Kaya Yanar - Made in Germany
synopsis: German-Turkish comedian Kaya Yanar delivers another delightful dose of his distinctive multicultural humor in this standup concert.

title: Love Me!
synopsis: Crass and impulsive, a brash young woman harbors a secret desire for love but cannot prevent herself from pushing the limits of her relationships.

title: Hirschen
synopsis: The residents of Hirschen stumble on a creative idea to boost their struggling villages economy after a driver runs into a deer and seeks their help.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Helmut Schmidt -- Lebensfragen
synopsis: This made-for-TV drama charts the life of former West German Chancellor Helmut Schmidt, who led his nation through the turbulent 1970s and early 80s.

title: Hubert und Staller: Die ins Gras beissen
synopsis: While dealing with a stalled car and a stubborn cow, Hubert and Staller make a grim discovery that sets off a bizarre murder investigation.

title: Sketch History
synopsis: With subtly irreverent humor, this series offers a brief history of the world, from the Stone Age to the 1970s and the fall of the Berlin Wall.

title: Geheimnisse des Dritten Reichs
synopsis: This series examines the inner workings of the Nazi regime with interviews of remaining survivors of the Third Reich as well as contemporary experts.

title: Der Bärenhäuter
synopsis: Penniless Christoffel makes a fiendish bargain: For a boundless supply of cash, he must adopt the filthy life of a bear. But then he falls in love.

title: Schubert In Love
synopsis: The last of his family line, Olaf Schubert doesnt have time for a girlfriend but dutifully searches for one when his father demands offspring.

title: Frauen, die Geschichte machten
synopsis: Get an in-depth look at the lives and legacies of some of historys most influential women, including Cleopatra, Elizabeth I and Catherine the Great.

title: Busting the Berlin Wall
synopsis: This documentary chronicles some of the most daring and spectacular escape stories at the Berlin Wall, where a wrong move could lead to certain death.

title: Serdar Somuncu - Der Hassprediger liest BILD
synopsis: With no previous preparation, Turkish-German comedian Serdar Somuncu performs a set based entirely on what he sees when opening up a German tabloid.

title: Die Ostsee von oben
synopsis: Aerial photography delivers a breathtaking view of the Baltic Sea and its shorelines from the German-Danish border to the beaches of Poland.

title: Die Suche nach Hitlers Volk
synopsis: As World War II ends, U.S. Army officer Saul Padover talks with scores of Germans to understand the cultural mind-set that supported the Third Reich.

title: Die Toten vom Bodensee
synopsis: A series of cross-border crimes forces German policeman Michael and his Austrian counterpart Hannah to forget their differences and work together.

title: Armans Geheimnis
synopsis: After facing problems at home, a troubled girl seeks peace on a horse farm, where she and other struggling teens stumble upon a fantastical adventure.

title: Die Bülent Ceylan Show
synopsis: Comedian Bülent Ceylan brings his colorful characters, quirky insights and lots of guest stars to this series showcasing his cutting-edge humor.

title: Wir Geiseln der SS
synopsis: This miniseries traces the remarkable story of 139 high-profile SS hostages who turned the tables on their captors in the final days of World War II.

title: Der Island-Krimi
synopsis: A successful Reykjavik mystery writer finds herself applying the principles of storytelling to solve real-life murder mysteries.

title: PussyTerror TV
synopsis: Rising star Carolin Kebekus and celebrity guests entertain in an irreverent, edgy and topical mix of stand-up, film clips and offbeat musical acts.

title: Bulent Ceylan - Ganz schon turbulent
synopsis: Turkish-German comic Bülent Ceylan demonstrates his hilarious versatility in this sold-out show from SAP Arena in his hometown of Mannheim.

title: Plötzlich Türke
synopsis: When his papers are inexplicably declared invalid, a promising musician from Germany goes down a bureaucratic rabbit hole to reapply for citizenship.

title: Der Heilige Krieg
synopsis: This series looks at the historical interplay between Islam and Christianity and how age-old conflicts like the Crusades inform attitudes today.

title: Make Love
synopsis: Sex therapist Ann-Marlene Henning asks adults young and old about their sex lives, perceptions and fears as she explains good sex can be learned.

title: Buddy Ogün: V.I.P. Was Los!
synopsis: Gangsta comic Buddy Ogün and his manager hit the road for a crazy concert tour through Germany, abducting fussy alter-ego Che along the way.

title: Osama Bin Laden: Up Close and Personal
synopsis: Four years after a Navy SEAL team killed Osama Bin Laden in a raid on his compound, his correspondence sheds new light on his mindset and final years.

title: Weltenbrand
synopsis: Carefully restored and colorized archive footage, along with historical reenactments, brings World War I and its deadly consequences to life.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in Österreich
synopsis: Sarah Wiener returns to Austria to find many changes, including some of the cuisine, and sets out to explore her native land as a virtual stranger.

title: Spirit Berlin
synopsis: Eager to take a step toward discovering his own inner peace, a young acting student explores different types of spirituality in Berlin.

title: Die Mockridges - Eine Knallerfamilie
synopsis: In this comedy series, a big family of stand-ups, performers and YouTube stars struggle to balance everyday life with the weirdness of show business.

title: Ägypten
synopsis: Experience Egypts rich Pharaonic history, from the foundation of the empire under King Narmer to the flourishing dynasty of Ramses the Great.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in den Alpen
synopsis: Sarah Wiener visits the Alps to see fighting cows, learn from local fishermen, hunt chamois and try local dishes that shell later prepare herself.

title: Versicherungsvertreter 2  - Mehmet Göker macht weiter
synopsis: On the run from the law in Germany, shifty entrepreneur Mehmet Göker sets up shop in Turkey and wins over a whole new crew of devoted followers.

title: The Presence
synopsis: Hoping to film paranormal activity, three friends break into an abandoned castle, where an evil presence soon hounds them into terror and madness.

title: Eckart von Hirschhausen - Glück kommt selten allein
synopsis: Dr. Eckart von Hirschhausen, the man known as Germanys funniest doctor, examines the science behind the pursuit and retention of happiness.

title: 2057: The World in 50 Years
synopsis: Theoretical physicist Michio Kaku examines what our bodies, our cities, and our world will look like 50 years into the future.

title: Pettersson und Findus
synopsis: Every day is full of new adventures for a farmer and his playful talking cat in this show based on a popular childrens book series.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in Asien
synopsis: Austrias Sarah Wiener explores the culinary side of Asia, sampling real Japanese sushi, tasting Sichuan peppers and visiting Vietnamese shops.

title: Geliebte Feinde - Die Deutschen und die Franzosen
synopsis: Explore the intimate but fractious history between Germany and France, from a shared genesis under Charlemagne to the horrors of two world wars.

title: Im Angesicht des Verbrechens
synopsis: Marek, a cop, and Jelena, a prostitute, are both drawn into the fast and furious world of the Russian mafia in Berlin.

title: Die Atombombe im Vorgarten - Geschichten aus dem Kalten Krieg
synopsis: This sobering roundup of nuclear mishaps highlights lost bombs, reckless acts and dangerous misuses of nuclear materials following World War II.

title: Olaf Schubert Live! - Meine Kämpfe
synopsis: Olaf Schubert entertains with his signature mix of music and comedy as he rallies his fans to make the world a better place.

title: Bodo Wartke - Noah war ein Archetyp – Live im Schmidts Tivoli in Hamburg
synopsis: This live performance offers an up-close and personal experience of a show featuring satirical singer, songwriter and pianist Bodo Wartke.

title: Cindy aus Marzahn - Schizophren: Ich wollte ne Prinzessin sein
synopsis: Sarcastic and bold, Cindy from Marzahn never holds back as she describes her adventures as the schizophrenic, illegitimate sister of Paris Hilton.

title: Bülent Ceylan - Kebabbel net
synopsis: Comedian and cabaret artist Bülent Ceylan trots out some of his best-loved bits and characters at the SAP Arena in Mannheim, Germany.

title: Dr. Eckart von Hirschhausen - Liebesbeweise
synopsis: Dr. Eckart von Hirschhausen tackles the topic of love, using science and comedy to shed light on the mysteries of romance.

title: Bülent Ceylan - Halb getürkt
synopsis: Turkish-German stand-up comedian Bülent Ceylan inhabits a succession of quirky characters over the course of his live performance.

title: Aufstand der Wale - Moby Dicks wahre Geschichte
synopsis: This documentary examines legends of sperm whales sinking 19th-century wooden ships, with a dive to a whaling ship graveyard off the Chilean coast.

title: Dornröschen
synopsis: When an evil sorceresss curse sends a young woman into a 100-year sleep, only a kiss from a prince whos found true love can awaken her.

title: Dieter Nuhr: Nuhr in Berlin
synopsis: The cerebral and popular German cabaret comic expounds his theories on gender norms, primal instincts and a decidedly gastrointestinal Big Bang.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Badesalz: Bindannda
synopsis: In this filmed stage show, tin can maker Peters paragliding excursion goes hilariously awry when his chute misfires and lands him in a remote forest.

title: Amok
synopsis: A depressed accountants unexpected promotion triggers buried memories of traumatic events, unleashing a violent rage that he has long suppressed.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Der letzte Cowboy
synopsis: When his management position at a vacuum cleaner manufacturer is jeopardized, a middle-aged man hits the streets to sell 60 units in six weeks.

title: Atze Schröder - Schmerzfrei
synopsis: German comedian Atze Schröder answers burning questions and riffs on everything from sex to reincarnation during this stand-up comedy special.

title: Phoenixsee
synopsis: Two proud families with contrasting histories and values clash against the newly formed and rapidly changing backdrop of Phoenix Lake.

title: Matze Knop: Operation Testosteron - LIVE
synopsis: In his stage show, chameleon comic Matze Knop offers droll insights into lifes trials, from clumsy first kisses to couples vacations in Greece.

title: The Search for Hitlers Bomb
synopsis: Although there is some evidence that Adolf Hitler ordered its development, the question remains: Were the Nazis close to having an atomic bomb?

title: Harry G - Das Leben mit dem Isarpreiss
synopsis: At the packed Kesselhaus in Munich, popular web comedian Harry G takes on the quirks of the Bavarian capitols culture with his usual acerbic wit.

title: Buddy Ogün: Ich mach Sie klar, Was’los!
synopsis: Buddy Ogün and his manager expect a routine performance -- until a pretty blonde appears and the comics many wacky personas compete to get the girl.

title: Olaf Schubert Live - Ich bin bei Euch
synopsis: This live performance captures rising star Olaf Schubert on stage in Erfurt, Germany, for a night thats packed with puns, songs and crazy stories.

title: Tankstellan des Glücks
synopsis: From Berlin to Slovakia, unconventional host Friedrich Liechtenstein tours an array of historic, scenic and futuristic gas stations across Europe.

title: Der Dennis: Leider Nein! Leider Garnich!
synopsis: Comedian Dennis mines his everyday life with his grandmother, girlfriend and pals for laughs, trying to be cool no matter what actually happens.

title: Markus Krebs: Hocker Rocker Live
synopsis: Performing at a lively bar, German stand-up comedian Markus Krebs dishes on how times have changed, both for better and for worse.

title: Philip Simon: Ende der Schonzeit
synopsis: Comic philosopher Philip Simon takes the stage in Cologne to ruminate on the futility of political debates and the senselessness of daily life.

title: Maxi Gstettenbauer: Nerdisch by Nature
synopsis: Affable stand-up comedian Maxi Gstettenbauer discusses first dates, his moms Facebook use and farming-simulation video games before a live audience.

title: Adventure Ocean Quest
synopsis: Free-diving master Frédéric Buyle travels to Mexico and French Polynesia, where he gets up close and personal with sharks, whales, dolphins and more.

title: Anaconda - Silent Killer
synopsis: Journey to remote and unexplored parts of the Amazon rain forest, where toucans, howler monkeys and tapirs share space with the mighty anaconda.

title: The Huber Brothers - Life on a Cliff Edge
synopsis: The Huber brothers, superstars in the sport of climbing, attempt to finally defeat an old nemesis: the Karma route near Berchtesgaden, Germany.

title: Great India
synopsis: The Taj Mahal and the social and religious reforms of Emperor Ashoka the Great are brought to life to point the way for modern India to thrive.

title: The Battle Against Rome
synopsis: This documentary explains and re-creates the backstory of The Battle of Teutoburg Forest, which brought the Roman Empires army to its knees.

title: Wild Berlin
synopsis: Get to know the wild animals living in the metropolis of Berlin: a peregrine falcon, beavers, squirrels, ducks, and more, over four seasons.

title: Dawn of the Ocean
synopsis: Scientists examine the origins of the ocean, including the source of the water, the creation of life, and the evolution of marine life diversity.

title: Bembers
synopsis: In this stand-up special, German comic Bembers pokes fun at popular trends and conventional thinking to expose the madness around us.

title: Zum Geburtstag
synopsis: Desperate to be with Anna, Paul tricks Georg into breaking up with her. Now Anna and Paul are married ... but Georg returns with a story to tell.

title: Der sechste Sinn der Tiere
synopsis: Researchers work to better understand the natural early warning behaviors of animals as a way to alert humanity to impending natural disasters.

title: Nazis in the CIA
synopsis: Discover how the CIA recruited many former Nazis and Italian fascists during the Cold War to help them fight communism.

title: Secrets of the Third Reich II
synopsis: The lost, hidden, or never-known secrets of World War IIs Nazi regime are finally revealed in this new collection of astonishing true tales.

title: Monika Gruber: Irgendwas is immer
synopsis: The acclaimed German comedian tackles a host of touchy topics, including political correctness and staying healthy without losing your lunch.

title: Supertalent Mensch
synopsis: Certain individuals seem to possess superhuman abilities, from the Ice Man who is impervious to cold to a blind traveler with extraordinary hearing.

title: The Singing Ringing Tree: Tales from Europe
synopsis: In this fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, a beautiful but spoiled princess covets the titular mystical tree. To win her love, a prince embarks on an epic quest to find the tree for her -- but theres a big catch.

title: Das Mittelmeer
synopsis: Explore the natural beauty, diverse wildlife and timeless mysteries of the Mediterranean Sea and its surrounding areas.

title: Fast Forward
synopsis: Brilliant Vienna homicide investigator Angelika Schnell, known for her unconventional methods, proves chaos and order arent mutually exclusive.

title: Olaf Schubert Live! - SO!
synopsis: Dresden comedian Olaf Schubert is back on stage with his signature music act and causes laughing fits with peculiar solutions to daily problems.

title: Carolin Kebekus: PussyTerror Die Live-Show!
synopsis: Stand-up comic Carolin Kebekus doesnt hold back in a wild, in-your-face performance from the nexus of multiculturalism and feminine hygiene.

title: Patric Heizmann Live! - Ich bin dann mal schlank
synopsis: Author and fitness expert Patric Heizmann serves humor with nutritional value as he discusses junk food, calories and the battle between head and gut.

title: Suburbia - Women on the Edge
synopsis: Five well-to-do women live perfectly posh lives in the Viennese suburbs. But their worlds soon crumble to reveal a dark underbelly.

title: Luke Mockridge: Im Lucky, Im Luke
synopsis: Comedian Luke Mockridge takes his audience back in time on a journey through the 90s, reliving his youth with music and hilarious anecdotes.

title: Come On!: Therapy for the Undecided
synopsis: Sex therapist Anette does her best to help her patients, but when it comes to her own relationships, shes hardly an expert.

title: Enissa Amani: Ehrenwort
synopsis: Live from Hamburg, Iranian-German comedian Enissa Amani shares her take on German engineering, tax deductions and online fan-mail etiquette.

title: Deichbullen
synopsis: Two mismatched police officers face culture shock and a sinister mystery when theyre transferred from Hamburg to Kollmar on the Elbe.

title: Schneller als das Auge
synopsis: Using high-speed digital cameras to capture moments in super-slow motion, this series offers a peek into the incredible world of invisible movement.

title: Ultimate Beastmaster Germany
synopsis: Top athletes from Germany and five other nations take on a daunting obstacle course in this series hosted by Luke Mockridge and Hans Sarpei.

title: Cindy aus Marzahn - Nicht jeder Prinz kommt uffm Pferd!
synopsis: For Cindy from Marzahn, a prince on a white horse and glass slippers mean nothing.  Give her a man with wit, charm, a full set of teeth -- and a car.

title: Serdar Somuncu Live: H2 Universe - Die Machtergreifung
synopsis: Comedian Serdar Somuncu returns to the stage to take on political correctness, social media and the new age of intolerance.

title: Das Leben danach
synopsis: A young woman whos still struggling to come to terms with an accident that took place seven years ago channels her grief into anger and destruction.

title: Jürgen - Heute wird gelebt
synopsis: Two loners travel to Poland with a shady organization that matches German men with Eastern European women in hopes of finding true love.

title: ATZE - Revolution
synopsis: Wild stand-up comic Atze skewers the inanities and injustices of German society, from the price of gyros to the creation of a four-door Porsche.

title: Ingo Appelt - Männer muss man schlagen
synopsis: Sharp-tongued comedian Ingo Appelt pulls no punches as he pokes fun at men, taking them to task for all sorts of bad behavior.

title: Boris Becker: Der Spieler
synopsis: Tennis wunderkind Boris Becker made headlines by winning Wimbledon at 17. As he turns 50, footage of a year in his life reveals whats happened since.

title: Teddy Show - Whatcha Sayin...?!
synopsis: Teddy, eponymous host of Internet comedy sensation Teddy Show, offers a live set complete with music, dancing and his many alter egos.

title: Serdar Somuncu - Der Hassprediger/Hardcore Live!
synopsis: Comic Serdar Somuncu is an equal-opportunity offender, avoiding political correctness at every turn, skewering everyone with glee in his performance.

title: The Golden Goose: Tales from Europe
synopsis: The beloved Brothers Grimm fairy tale comes to life in this delightful 1964 family film from East Germany. Kindly shoemaker Klaus is given a golden-feathered goose that seems to entrance all who see it.

title: Bibi and Tina II
synopsis: When robbers hit Falkenstein castle, teen witch Bibi and pal Tina hunt for the crooks, then devise a plan to save the neighbors failing ranch.

title: Bibi and Tina: Girls Versus Boys
synopsis: At summer camp, young Bibi and her friends are pitted against the boys in a treasure hunt. But whats a witch to do when she loses her powers?

title: Alexander the Great
synopsis: This two-part Terra-X series delves into the fascinating life and myths surrounding Alexander the Great, the fourth-century B.C. king of Macedon.

title: Wilder Planet
synopsis: This eye-opening series transports viewers to landscapes around the world where violent forces of nature continuously change the face of the earth.

title: The Ehrlich Brothers Show
synopsis: In an eye-popping live show, the illusionist duo bends steel railroad tracks, makes a Harley-Davidson disappear, grows a tree in seconds and more.

title: Die Wilden Hühner
synopsis: Four eclectic friends make up the closest-knit clique in fifth grade. But when the unexpected occurs, they must join forces with a rival club of boys.

title: Tom and the Slice of Bread with Strawberry Jam and Honey
synopsis: Tom desperately wants bread with strawberry jam and honey, and thats exactly what Tom sets out to get -- despite the obstacles in his way.

title: Expeditionen ins Tierreich: Wildes Deutschland
synopsis: Explore the amazingly diverse wildlife and landscapes of Germany, from countless lakes to dense forests.

title: Expeditionen ins Tierreich: Wildes Skandinavien
synopsis: Explore the incredible wildlife, glaciers, volcanoes, fjords, and jungles of far Northern Europe, including Norway, Greenland, Denmark and more.

title: Expeditionen ins Tierreich: Abenteuer Nordsee
synopsis: Join the seasoned naturalists and film crew from the long-running documentary series as they explore the wildlife wonders of the North Sea.

title: Warum Männer nicht zuhören und Frauen schlecht einparken
synopsis: Jan and Katrins relationship started with a bang. But now, years later, are they still compatible or are evolutionary differences pushing them apart?

title: Turkish for Beginners
synopsis: When spirited German Lena and macho Turk Cem are stranded on a desert island, angry sparks fly between them as Cem insists on taking charge.

title: The Elementary Particles
synopsis: Neuroses brought on by childhood trauma take a toll when two half-brothers -- one a geneticist, the other a teacher -- embark on new love affairs.

title: Four Minutes
synopsis: An elderly music teacher who gives piano lessons to prisoners finds a prodigy in a young inmate and devotes herself to developing that talent.

title: Wild: Michael Mittermeier Live
synopsis: German comedian Michael Mittermeier attempts to answer that age-old question: When was the last time humanity went a little wild?
